EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at DevNexus 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for joining Pivotal and the Spring community at DevNexus 2017 <[[http://devnexus.commultiple?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=devnexus-q117]]>. We hope you enjoyed learning how enterprises are adopting cloud-native application architectures to drive modern, software experiences for their customers. If you’d like to talk to us about arranging a hands-on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=devnexus-q117]]> to begin a discussion.
In the meantime, if you’re doing microservices with Spring <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/building-spring-microservices-with-cloud-foundrys-new-container-networking-stack?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=devnexus-q117]]>, or maybe just looking for spare capacity for CI builds, temporary development or test environments, check out Pivotal Web Services <[[http://run.pivotal.io/spring/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=devnexus-q117]]>, a great public cloud for running Spring Framework (and .NET) on Cloud Foundry! Don’t forget to download your free copy of the O’Reilly eBook, Migrating to Cloud-Native Applications <[[http://pivotal.io/platform/migrating-to-cloud-native-application-architectures-ebook?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=devnexus-q117]]> on the Pivotal site, a useful primer for IT management on why cloud-native matters.
In case you missed anything, here’s a quick recap:
- Cloud-Native Java Workshop <[[https://devnexus.com/s/devnexus2017/presentations/15525]]> - Josh Long - Cloud-Native Architecture Patterns Workshop <[[https://devnexus.com/s/devnexus2017/presentations/17473]]> - Matt Stine - Microservices-based Streaming and Batch Data Processing Workshop <[[https://devnexus.com/s/devnexus2017/presentations/15480]]> - Sabby Anandan, Glenn Renfro - Reactive Spring <[[https://devnexus.com/s/devnexus2017/presentations/17213]]> - Josh Long - Securely Managing Secrets with Vault <[[https://devnexus.com/s/devnexus2017/presentations/17236]]> - Mark Paluch - Modern Batch Processing with Spring Batch <[[https://devnexus.com/s/devnexus2017/presentations/17523]]> - Michael Minella - Reactive Functional Data Pipelines with Spring Cloud Microservices <[[https://devnexus.com/s/devnexus2017/presentations/17320]]> - Marius Bogoevici, Mark Pollack - Reactor 3, the Reactive Foundation for Java 8 and Spring Framework 5.0 <[[https://devnexus.com/s/devnexus2017/presentations/17153]]> - Simon Baslé , Stephane Maldini - Data Processing With Microservices <[[https://devnexus.com/s/devnexus2017/presentations/17357]]> - Michael Minella - Breaking the Magician’s Code: Diving Deeper Into Spring Boot Internals <[[https://devnexus.com/s/devnexus2017/presentations/17410]]> - Madhura Bhave, Philip Webb - This Stuff is Cool, but HOW CAN I GET MY COMPANY TO DO IT? Businessing the S*** out of Transformative Development! <[[https://devnexus.com/s/devnexus2017/presentations/17198]]> - Mark Heckler - Architecture Deep Dive in Spring Security <[[https://devnexus.com/s/devnexus2017/presentations/17446]]> - Joe Grandja - Clouds & Containers: Give it to Me Straight, What’s the Difference & Why Should I Care? <[[https://devnexus.com/s/devnexus2017/presentations/17219]]> - Mark Heckler - Composing Music in the Cloud <[[https://devnexus.com/s/devnexus2017/presentations/17305]]> - James Weaver
Hungry for the latest in Spring, Pivotal and Cloud Foundry?
- Public Beta: Spring Cloud Services and C2C Networking on Pivotal Web Services <[[https://docs.run.pivotal.io/spring-cloud-services/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=devnexus-q117]]> - Spring Blog: Notes on Reactive Programming Part I: The Reactive Landscape <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/06/07/notes-on-reactive-programming-part-i-the-reactive-landscape]]> - Spring Blog: Spring MVC and Spring WebFlux <[[https://spring.io/blog/2017/02/23/spring-framework-5-0-m5-update]]> - Spring Blog: New in Spring Framework 5.0: Functional Web Framework <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/09/22/new-in-spring-5-functional-web-framework]]> - Spring Blog: Spring Cloud Data Flow 1.1 GA release <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/11/23/spring-cloud-data-flow-1-1-ga-released]]> - Pivotal POV blog: Now Available—Spring Cloud Services for Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/now-available-spring-cloud-services-for-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=devnexus-q117]]> - SpringOne Platform 2016 talk: Cloud-Native Java with Josh Long <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/09/12/springone-platform-2016-replay-cloud-native-java]]> - SpringOne Platform 2016 talk: The Journey From Monolith to Microservices: A Guided Adventure <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tx5h3hdvjfw]]> - SpringOne Platform 2016 talk: 12 Factor, or Cloud-Native Apps: What EXACTLY Does that Mean for Spring Developers? <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/09/12/springone-platform-2016-replay-12-factor-or-cloud-native-apps-what-exactly-does-that-mean-for-spring-developers]]>
Stay in touch with our team and join the Spring conversation on our blogs <[[http://spring.io/blog?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=devnexus-q117]]>, podcasts <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=devnexus-q117]]>, and on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/springcentral]]>.
We hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=devnexus-q117]]>!
Thank you, The Pivotal and Spring Team
